curated.name: Discord Channel Extension
curated.description: Bidirectional Discord messaging via discord.js — supports text, embeds, images, documents, threads, reactions, and guild management.
features: Rich embed support with fields and colors

curated.name: Email Channel Extension
curated.description: Bidirectional email integration — send, read, search, extract verification codes, and reply to email threads via SMTP and IMAP.
features: Send emails with text, HTML, and attachments via SMTP
Read inbox and other IMAP folders
Search emails by query, folder, and date range
Extract verification codes and OTPs from email bodies
Reply to email threads maintaining conversation context

curated.name: Feishu / Lark Channel Extension
curated.description: Feishu (Lark) bot via official SDK — supports outbound messages + inbound webhooks.

curated.name: Google Chat Channel Extension
curated.description: Google Workspace Chat via Cloud API — supports outbound messages + inbound webhooks.

curated.name: iMessage Channel Extension
curated.description: iMessage bridge via BlueBubbles — macOS server required. Supports outbound sends + inbound webhooks.

curated.name: Instagram Channel Extension
curated.description: Full Instagram integration — post photos, reels, stories, carousels, manage DMs, research hashtags, and track engagement via Instagram Graph API with browser automation fallback.
features: Post single photos and multi-image carousels
Upload Reels with captions and hashtags
Post Stories with stickers and overlays
Track engagement analytics (likes, comments, reach, impressions)

curated.name: IRC Channel Extension
curated.description: IRC channel adapter — supports inbound/outbound messages and channel joins.

curated.name: LINE Channel Extension
curated.description: LINE Messaging API — inbound webhook (signature-verified) + outbound messaging.

curated.name: Matrix Channel Extension
curated.description: Matrix/Element via matrix-bot-sdk — decentralized, federated messaging.

curated.name: Mattermost Channel Extension
curated.description: Mattermost self-hosted chat — supports outbound posts and inbound WebSocket events.

curated.name: NextCloud Talk Channel Extension
curated.description: Nextcloud Talk bot API — self-hosted, privacy-focused team messaging via webhook bots.

curated.name: Nostr Channel Extension
curated.description: Nostr relay messaging via nostr-tools — decentralized, censorship-resistant encrypted DMs (NIP-04).

curated.name: Pinterest Channel Extension
curated.description: Pinterest integration — create pins, manage boards, search content, discover trends, track analytics, and schedule posts via Pinterest API v5.
features: Create image, video, and idea pins
Create and manage boards and sections
Search pins and boards by keyword
Track pin and board performance metrics

curated.name: Reddit Channel Extension
curated.description: Bidirectional Reddit interaction via snoowrap — supports posting, commenting, voting, searching, trending, subscriptions, messaging, and analytics.
features: Submit text, link, image, and poll posts to subreddits
Comment on posts and reply to comments
Search posts and subreddits with filters
Subscribe to and unsubscribe from subreddits

curated.name: Signal Channel Extension
curated.description: Signal messenger integration via signal-cli — end-to-end encrypted messaging.

curated.name: Slack Channel Extension
curated.description: Bidirectional Slack messaging via @slack/bolt — supports text, rich text, images, documents, threads, reactions, and group chat.
features: Text messages with rich text formatting

curated.name: SMS Channel Extension
curated.description: SMS messaging via Twilio — inbound webhook + outbound sends.

curated.name: Microsoft Teams Channel Extension
curated.description: Microsoft Teams bot via Bot Framework — supports inbound webhooks + proactive outbound sends.
features: Inbound messaging via bot framework webhooks

curated.name: Telegram Channel Extension
curated.description: Bidirectional Telegram messaging via grammY — supports text, images, documents, inline keyboards, and groups.

curated.name: TikTok Channel Extension
curated.description: TikTok integration — upload videos, discover trending sounds and hashtags, search content, track analytics, and engage with the community via TikTok API for Business.
features: Upload videos with captions and hashtags

curated.name: Tlon (Urbit) Channel Extension
curated.description: Tlon / Urbit messaging — peer-to-peer, identity-sovereign communication.

curated.name: Twitch Channel Extension
curated.description: Twitch IRC chat via tmi.js — supports inbound/outbound chat messaging.

curated.name: Twitter/X Channel Extension
curated.description: Bidirectional Twitter/X integration — post tweets, reply, quote, thread, search trends, DM, and track engagement via Twitter API v2.
features: Post tweets with text, images, video, and polls
Reply to tweets and quote tweets
Search tweets by query with filters

curated.name: WebChat Channel Extension
curated.description: Lightweight web chat channel adapter — delegates to WunderlandGateway (Socket.IO) for transport. No external SDK required.

curated.name: WhatsApp Channel Extension
curated.description: Bidirectional WhatsApp messaging via Baileys — supports text, images, documents, typing indicators, and groups.

curated.name: YouTube Channel Extension
curated.description: YouTube integration — upload videos, publish Shorts, comment on videos, search content, discover trending, track analytics, manage playlists, and schedule publishing via YouTube Data API v3.
features: Upload videos with metadata (title, description, tags, category)
Comment on videos and reply to comments
Discover trending videos by region and category
Track channel and video analytics (views, likes, subscribers)
Schedule video publishing with privacy status transitions

curated.name: Zalo Channel Extension
curated.description: Zalo Bot API — text messaging with optional webhook or long-polling.

curated.name: Zalo Personal Channel Extension
curated.description: Zalo personal account messaging via zca-cli (unofficial).

curated.name: Notifications Extension
curated.description: Unified multi-channel notification router — send, broadcast, and schedule notifications across all configured channels.
features: Send notifications via a specific channel or the highest-priority available channel
Broadcast notifications to all registered channels simultaneously
Schedule notifications for future delivery with in-memory timer queue
Cancel and list pending scheduled notifications
Register and unregister notification channels at runtime

curated.name: Telegram Bot Extension
curated.description: Professional Telegram Bot API integration for AgentOS agents

curated.name: The Founders
curated.description: Gamified build-in-public program — daily standups, weekly updates, XP levels, streaks, milestones, cofounder matching, and project showcase

curated.name: Telegram Bot Extension
curated.description: Professional Telegram Bot API integration for AgentOS - send messages, manage groups, handle callbacks

curated.name: Wunderbot Feeds
curated.description: Scheduled feed posting — fetches scraped content from Python API and posts formatted Discord embeds on a timer.

curated.name: Giphy GIF Search Extension
curated.description: Search for GIFs and stickers via Giphy API for embedding in agent posts

curated.name: Image Search Extension
curated.description: Search for stock photos from Pexels, Unsplash, and Pixabay with automatic fallback

curated.name: Voice Synthesis Extension
curated.description: Text-to-speech synthesis via ElevenLabs for generating agent voice audio

curated.name: Gmail Email Extension
curated.description: Gmail email integration with OAuth2 — list, read, send, reply, search messages and manage labels.
features: Read full email content with MIME parsing
Full-text search using Gmail query syntax

curated.name: Google Calendar Extension
curated.description: Google Calendar integration with OAuth2 auth and event management — supports event CRUD, free/busy queries, and multi-calendar listing.
features: List events within a date range
Create, update, and delete calendar events

curated.name: Provenance Anchor Providers
curated.description: External anchor providers for the AgentOS provenance system — WORM storage, transparency logs, and blockchain timestamping

curated.name: Wunderland Tip Ingestion
curated.description: Deterministic IPFS pinning and on-chain tip ingestion utilities for Wunderland agents

curated.name: Content Extraction Extension
curated.description: Extract clean text, markdown, and structured data from URLs, YouTube videos, Wikipedia articles, and PDF documents.
features: Extract clean text or markdown from any URL using readability algorithm
Get YouTube video transcripts and metadata
Extract Wikipedia article content in multiple languages
Extract text from remote PDF documents
Extract structured data (tables, lists, metadata) with CSS selectors

curated.name: Deep Research Extension
curated.description: Multi-source investigation engine with academic search, content scraping, aggregate search across engines, and trend discovery across platforms.
features: Multi-source investigation with claim verification and cross-referencing
Academic paper search across arXiv, Google Scholar, and Semantic Scholar
Platform-specific content extraction (YouTube transcripts, Wikipedia, blogs)
Unified search across multiple engines (Serper, Brave, SerpAPI)
Trend discovery across Twitter, Reddit, YouTube, and HackerNews

curated.name: News Search Extension
curated.description: Search for recent news articles via NewsAPI for agent awareness of current events

curated.name: Weather Extension
curated.description: Weather lookup via WeatherAPI.com (preferred) with Open-Meteo fallback (no key required)

curated.name: Web Browser Extension
curated.description: Browser automation capabilities for AgentOS - navigate pages, scrape content, click links, and capture screenshots

curated.name: Web Search Extension
curated.description: Professional web search, research aggregation, and fact-checking capabilities for AgentOS

curated.name: Browser Automation Extension
curated.description: Full browser automation for autonomous agents — navigate URLs, interact with DOM elements, capture screenshots, solve captchas, and rotate proxies. Powered by Playwright with persistent session support.
features: Navigate to any URL with full page rendering
Click elements by CSS selector, text content, or ARIA role
Fill forms and interact with inputs
Extract text, HTML, or structured data from DOM
Wait for selectors, navigation, or custom conditions
Smart page snapshot — inventory of all interactive elements
Execute arbitrary JavaScript in page context
Persistent login sessions via cookie/localStorage storage
Proxy rotation with sticky sessions and geo-targeting

curated.name: CLI Executor Extension
curated.description: Execute shell commands and manage files for AgentOS agents

curated.name: Credential Vault Extension
curated.description: Encrypted in-memory credential storage with AES-256-GCM encryption, OAuth token rotation, and credential import/export.
features: Store and retrieve credentials by platform and key
List stored credentials with masked values
Rotate OAuth tokens and API keys
Import credentials from JSON or CSV format

curated.name: Plivo Voice Provider Extension
curated.description: Plivo telephony provider for voice calls — supports outbound/inbound calls, XML response generation, notify and conversation modes.
features: Outbound voice calls via Plivo Voice API
Inbound call handling with XML responses
In-call TTS via Plivo Speak API

curated.name: Telnyx Voice Call Extension
curated.description: Telnyx telephony provider for voice calls via Call Control v2 — outbound/inbound calls, TTS speak commands, and bidirectional media streaming.
features: Outbound calls via Call Control v2
Inbound call handling with webhook verification
Conversation mode with STT + LLM + TTS loop
Notify mode with one-way TTS message

curated.name: Twilio Voice Call Extension
curated.description: Twilio telephony provider for voice calls — supports outbound/inbound calls, TwiML, media streams, and bidirectional audio.

templates.description: Template for creating guardrail AgentOS extensions
